self.title: CDISC Questionnaire HAMD 21 Test Code Terminology

definition: Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21-Item test code.
name: QS-Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21-Item Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire HAMD 21 Test Code Terminology
synonyms: QS-Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21-Item Test Code

terms.definition: Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Depressed mood: sadness, hopeless, helpless, worthless.
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Feelings of guilt.
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Suicide.
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Insomnia early.
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Insomnia middle.
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Insomnia late.
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Work and activities.
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Retardation: psychomotor (slowness of thought and speech; impaired ability to concentrate; decreased motor activity).
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Agitation.
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Anxiety Psychological.

Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Anxiety somatic: physiological concomitants of anxiety, (i.e., effects of autonomic overactivity, 'butterflies,' indigestion, stomach cramps, belching, diarrhea, palpitations, hyperventilation, paresthesia, sweating, flushing, tremor, headache, urinary frequency).
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Somatic symptoms gastro-intestinal.
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Somatic symptoms general.
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Genital symptoms: symptoms such as: loss of libido; impaired sexual performance; menstrual disturbances.
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Hypochondriasis.
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Loss of weight when rating by history.
terms.preferredTerm: HAMD-21 - Loss of Weight by History

terms.definition: Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Loss of weight on weekly ratings by war psychiatrist, when actual weight changes are measured.
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Insight.
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Diurnal variation.
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Diurnal variation severity.
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Depersonalization and derealization: such as feelings of unreality; nihilistic ideas.
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Paranoid symptoms.
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Obsessional and compulsive symptoms.
Hamilton Depression Rating Scale 21 Item - Total score.
